FAQ

Sources

Data on this site is sourced from various official and unofficial locations. The following table describes each.

Official FAQs The TFTCG folk at WotC have a number of PDF FAQs that are included in this site:
  • Wave 1 FAQ
  • Wave 2 and 3 FAQ
  • Wave 4 FAQ
  • Tournament Rules
Rules Roundup Those same excellent folk at WotC provide periodic additional answers to questions emailed to them in their Rules Roundup section.
Community Other FAQ information is contributed to this site by the community.
